channel.title: Comments on: From SUNW to JAVA

item.title: By: Stock Trading Software
item.dc:creator: Stock Trading Software
item.description: Some copanies just seem to live to do little stupid gimicky things like this and I can never really understand why. Real investors definatly don't care, and changing ticker symbols can even have a negative mental association because it's a way a lot of companies try to recover after previsous bad news.
item.content:encoded: Some copanies just seem to live to do little stupid gimicky things like this and I can never really understand why. Real investors definatly don’t care, and changing ticker symbols can even have a negative mental association because it’s a way a lot of companies try to recover after previsous bad news.

item.title: By: Lloyd Budd
item.dc:creator: Lloyd Budd
item.description: This is just silly. It guarantees that another ticker change is in their future, because no programming language family will stay on top for many forever.
item.content:encoded: This is just silly. It guarantees that another ticker change is in their future, because no programming language family will stay on top for many forever.
